commit.message:
Rollup merge of #74168 - JohnTitor:help-for-in-band-lifetimes, r=petrochenkov

Add a help to use `in_band_lifetimes` in nightly

Fixes #73775

Rollup merge of #74168 - JohnTitor:help-for-in-band-lifetimes, r=petrochenkov

Add a help to use `in_band_lifetimes` in nightly

Fixes #73775
